title: Grok AI Safety Failures and Public Release Timeline
description: Investigation into xAI's Grok chatbot safety failures, timeline of public incidents, and Elon Musk's response to safety concerns. Focus on specific dates of safety breaches and policy changes.
research_areas: What are the specific dates and actors involved in Grok AI Safety Failures and Public Release Timeline?
What are the financial amounts and policy changes related to this investigation?
How does this connect to broader institutional capture patterns?
What documentation and sources verify these timeline events?
source_requirements: Government documents, financial records, policy communications
pdf_source: Groks Safety Crisis Reveals AIs Dangerous New Frontier.pdf
